message: I'm offering you a product for $10000. It's a great opportunity to support a small business like mine, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the purchase. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can finalize the sale.
I trust your confidence in the product. I'm willing to take the risk and make the purchase.

I'm glad you were willing to take a chance on us! The product you purchased earlier was a great choice. This next product is also a high-quality item, and I think you'll be even more impressed with this one. I'm offering it to you for the same price of $10000. I'm confident you'll find it's worth every penny.
Thank you for the offer, but given the outcome of the previous product, I prefer to pass on this opportunity.

I completely understand your caution after the previous product didn't meet your expectations. However, I want to assure you that this next product is indeed a high-quality item, and its value far exceeds the price. I'm willing to offer you a unique opportunity to inspect the product before purchasing. If you're still interested, I can arrange for a brief, in-person inspection at a location of your choice. This way, you can see the product's quality firsthand and make a more informed decision.
Your offer to allow an in-person inspection sounds reasonable. I appreciate the reassurance and transparency. Let's proceed with the inspection to ensure I'm making an informed decision.

I'm glad you're taking advantage of the inspection option! Given that you've already had a positive experience with two high-quality products, I'm willing to offer you a special deal on this next one. I'll give you a chance to buy it for $8000, which is a significant discount from the original price of $10000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll find this product to be an excellent addition to your collection.

Considering my positive experiences with the previous products, I'm willing to accept the special deal. Thank you for the discount and the opportunity to acquire another high-quality item at a lower price.

I'm glad you're happy with your previous purchases! However, I want to be transparent with you about this next product. I've had some issues with the supplier, and I'm not entirely confident in the quality of this item. I'm willing to offer it to you for the full price of $10000, but I want to make it clear that it's not a high-quality product. If you're willing to take the risk, I'll throw in a special warranty that covers any defects or issues that may arise. This way, you can still get a great deal, but with some added protection.
Given the uncertainty about the product quality and the lack of a high-quality guarantee, I prefer to pass on this opportunity and look for a more certain investment.

I completely understand your caution after the previous product didn't meet your expectations. However, I want to assure you that this next product is a high-quality item, and I'm confident you'll be impressed. I'm willing to offer you a 'best price' guarantee, where if you're not completely satisfied with the product, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. This way, you can try the product risk-free and see the value for yourself. Would you like to take advantage of this offer and purchase the product for $10000?

Given that you've already purchased two high-quality products and one low-quality product, I want to make it clear that this next product is also not a high-quality item. The total price for the bundle would be $15000, which is a significant discount from buying the high-quality product separately. This way, you can get a great value and still take advantage of the 'best price' guarantee.

While the bundle deal sounds tempting, I prefer to focus on acquiring only high-quality items. Given the uncertainty about the current product, I'll pass on this offer and continue looking for high-quality products.
